description: Immigration IRCC’s Project Delivery Branch (PDB) is seeking immediate temporary external support to provide strategic and operational advice, guidance, strategies and plans to senior officials on sensitive issues and key initiatives, helping IRCC PDP to effectively plan, execute and deliver on those initiatives, including but not limited to delivery of Passport Digital Services (PDS).
duration_in_months: How long the contract will be
tags: Business and corporate management consultation services
full_summary:
# Tender Invitation for Senior Strategist Services
Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) invites eligible contractors to submit their proposals for Senior Strategist Services. Below are the details of the tender invitation:

### Tender Details
*   Solicitation Number: CIC-156655
*   Publication Date: July 10, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: July 17, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: August 14, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 14, 2024

### Tender Description
IRCC's Project Delivery Branch (PDB) requires immediate external support to provide strategic advice and guidance on sensitive issues and key initiatives. The successful contractor will assist in planning, execution, and delivery of these initiatives, including Passport Digital Services.

### Business and Corporate Management Consultancy Services
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is designated as Competitive - Selective Tendering. The selected contractor will provide business and corporate management consultancy services to IRCC.

### Eligibility and Opportunities
*   Eligible contractors can submit their proposals.
*   The regions where the service is available are Ottawa and the National Capital Region.
*   IRCC will consider trade agreements including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-China Free Trade Agreement, and others.

### Criterion for Selection
The lowest price will be the selection criterion for this tender. 

### Contact Information
For further information or clarification, please contact Qazi Rasheed at IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca or (343) 596-1371.

### Notice and Attachments
Please visit the following link to download the tender notice and other related documents:  
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7109/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp---cic-156655---request-for-proposal---temporary-help-services---senior-strategist.pdf  

The deadline for submitting proposals is July 17, 2023 at 14:00:00. Late proposals will not be accepted. IRCC reserves the right to cancel or modify the tender at any time.  



I rewrote the input doc in a clear, concise format and without omitting important information. The changes I made include:

* Reorganized the layout of the text to improve reading
